trends: There have been no other sightings in Maxwell
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: DISC SHAPED OBJECT AND FIREBALL, POSSIBLE ABDUCTION.
divs: sighting detailsdisc shaped object seen sw of location, orange lights across front with red lights flashing from east to west. fireball visible sw of location. strange noises heard in house. possible abduction, fighting 'demons' all night and woke with unexplained abrasion on right knee. fireball was also seen around 8 pm on oct. 18th by homeowner, and both houseguests. on oct 23rd neighbor 1\2 mile east: husband dreamed wife went to outer space for a week and didn't leave him any clean underwear. our location is longitude 104.2 latitude 36.49. detail: homeowner: fought 'demons' all night, woke with unexplained abrasion on right knee. houseguest a: heard unusual noise around 8:45 pm, unable to describe it. heard her name called. houseguest b: around 8:45 pm took dog outside, and saw fireball in the sky to the sw of our location. at midnight she went outside again and the fireball was still there. also saw a disk shaped object which was ringed with orange lights, and with a red light rotating around it from left to right.
